name: Ervin HOHENSEE et al., Appellants, v. Milton SHAPP et al.

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: Ervin HOHENSEE et al., Appellants, v. Milton SHAPP et al.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Order of the Commonwealth Court 39 Pa.Cmwlth. 478, 395 A.2d 636, is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Ervin Hohensee, I. P. P., Chinchilla, pro se.
Susan J. Forney, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Russell A. Davis, Harrisburg, for Herbert Fineman.
William Fetterhoff, Harrisburg, for W. Louis Copper-smith.
casebody.head_matter:
425 A.2d 744
Ervin HOHENSEE et al., Appellants, v. Milton SHAPP et al.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 22, 1981.
Decided Feb. 27, 1981.
Ervin Hohensee, I. P. P., Chinchilla, pro se.
Susan J. Forney, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Russell A. Davis, Harrisburg, for Herbert Fineman.
William Fetterhoff, Harrisburg, for W. Louis Copper-smith.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
